tagline: Professional order printing with automatic Indian GST compliance for T-shirt stores
description: Transform your Indian T-shirt store's order management with automated GST calculations and professional printing capabilities. Built specifically for Indian businesses with CGST/SGST/IGST support, HSN codes, and textile-specific features.
key_features: CGST/SGST vs IGST determination based on location
HSN code support for textile products
Custom template editor with live preview
Bulk PDF generation for multiple orders
T-shirt specific product details (size, color, design)
GSTIN and Indian business information integration
installation_requirements: Modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

data_usage.data_retention: Data is retained as long as the app is installed. Upon uninstallation, all data is deleted within 30 days.
data_usage.data_sharing: No data is shared with third parties. All data remains within Shopify's secure infrastructure.

competitive_advantages: Only app specifically designed for Indian T-shirt stores
Automatic GST compliance with Indian tax laws
Built-in textile industry knowledge (HSN codes, sizing)
Native Shopify integration with Polaris UI

use_cases.title: GST Compliant Receipts
use_cases.description: Automatically generate order receipts with correct GST calculations, CGST/SGST/IGST breakdown, and HSN codes for textile products.

use_cases.title: Bulk Order Processing
use_cases.description: Process multiple orders at once with bulk PDF generation and CSV export for accounting and record-keeping.

use_cases.title: Professional Branding
use_cases.description: Create custom-branded order documents with business logo, GSTIN, and professional layout for enhanced customer experience.

use_cases.title: Accounting Integration
use_cases.description: Export order data with detailed GST breakdown in CSV format for easy integration with accounting software.

technical_specifications.monitoring: Built-in health checks and error tracking
